                              'GD<br><br>Former front end developer who likes '
                              'to have things in order. A DIY aficionado '
                              'taking breaks from the tools to take his family '
                              'to explore nature.<br><br>What we’re working '
                              'on<br><br>There are essentially two '
                              'applications we work on most of the time - '
                              '<strong>Analytical Designer</strong> and '
                              '<strong>Dashboards</strong>. These Business '
                              'Intelligence applications make everyday work '
                              'easier for approximately 16,000 active users - '
                              'they allow them to easily and clearly display '
                              'current data and use it to make the right '
                              'decisions. We have been in charge of both '
                              'applications for several years and we don’t '
                              'plan to just say goodbye to them. Our platform '
                              'is quite complex and we won’t lie to you - it '
                              'takes a few weeks or months to get comfortably '
                              'familiar with everything.<br><br>On top of '
                              'those two apps, we work on our SDK package '
                              'Gooddata.UI changing it almost every day. '
                              'GoodData.UI is the foundation of nearly all of '
                              'our UI apps that are developed by our '
                              'colleagues in Prague. Once in a while, we have '
                              'an opportunity to develop a brand new app from '
                              'scratch and deploy it onto our Immutable '
                              'Infrastructure. But most of the time we modify, '
                              'polish, and tune our favorite Analytical '
                              'Designer and Dashboards.<br><br>Analytical '
                              'Designer<br><br>Analytical Designer allows you '
                              'to create ad hoc reports and analysis over '
                              'your, or your customers’, data. Most of it is '
                              'drag-and-drop and there’s a ton of settings. '
                              'Analytical Designer builds on Gooddata.UI SDK '
                              'and uses REST API to talk to one of our two '
                              'backends (a hosted platform or your own on-site '
                              'deployed GoodData.CN). Intrigued? You can give '
                              'it a try yourself using a free account '
                              'option.<br><br><em>Tech stack: TypeScript, '
                              'React + Redux + Saga, Jest + Enzyme, '
                              'TestCafe.<br><br></em>Dashboards<br><br>Once '
                              'you create your own insights in Analytical '
                              'Designer, it’s time to present them in a neat '
                              'dashboard, label it, apply filters and share '
                              'with the interested parties. Such as your boss '
                              ':) This is what the Dashboards app is for. The '
                              'target audience differs from the one of '
                              'Analytical Designer, but it’s also built over '
                              'the SDK, it talks to both backends, and uses '
                              'the same tech. That too is available in our '
                              'Free pricing plan.<br><br><em>Tech stack: '
                              'TypeScript, React + Redux + Saga, Jest + '
                              'Enzyme, '
                              'Cypress.<br><br></em>GoodData.UI<br><br>GoodData.UI '
                              'is a JavaScript/TypeScript SDK that helps your '
                              'customers build their own UI applications over '
                              'the GoodData platform. The library is open '
                              'source and it’s owned by our Prague colleagues. '
                              'However, as GoodData.UI effectively forms the '
                              'chassis for our Analytical Designer and '
                              'Dashboards, we regularly contribute with new '
                              '‘books’. See GoodData.UI for more '
                              'information.<br><br><em>Tech stack: TypeScript, '
                              'React + Redux + Saga, Jest + Enzyme, Storybook '
                              '+ Backstop, Cypress.<br><br></em>What you need '
                              'to know as a developer...<br><br>We use '
                              '<strong>TypeScript</strong> everywhere, '
                              'otherwise our apps would be difficult to '
                              'manage. If you don’t have a full command of '
                              '<strong>TypeScript</strong>, don’t worry, we’re '
                              'not closing the door in front of you. You’ll '
                              'just have to master it quickly :)<br><br>Our UI '
                              'is built on <strong>React</strong>. We use '
                              '<strong>Redux</strong> for state management and '
                              '<strong>Redux Saga</strong> for side effects. '
                              "If you've never worked with React (Hello World "
                              "doesn't count), again, it doesn't matter. If "
                              'you are familiar with another library or '
                              'framework and have a positive attitude towards '
                              'React, it will be enough. Just be aware that '
                              'we’re not too keen to listen to how Angular is '
                              'much better all day long :) But you can try to '
                              'convince us.<br><br>For testing, we use '
                              '<strong>Jest, Enzyme</strong>, and '
                              '<strong>Backstop</strong>. For E2E tests, '
                              'there’s <strong>Cypress</strong>, into which we '
                              'migrate older <strong>TestCafe</strong> tests. '
                              'Cypress simply suits us better. Oh, yeah, we '
                              'test routinely and almost everything. If you '
                              "don't have much experience with testing, no "
                              'problem - we will teach you.<br><br>Manual '
                              'testing is conducted by our QA team in Vietnam. '
                              'We work with three technically very skilled QA '
                              'engineers on a daily basis.<br><br>We keep our '
                              'code in <strong>GitHub</strong> although some '
                              'parts are on GitLab. Working with '
                              '<strong>Git</strong> is unavoidable and we '
                              'expect you to be able to commit and rebase at '
                              'least. We do code reviews for ALL changes in '
                              'the code - nothing can be merged without a peer '
                              'review. This and using pair programming allows '
                              'us to share knowledge and maintain code '
                              'quality. This will allow you to work with '
                              'people who can teach you a lot. And if you '
                              'dare, you can be tasked to be a lead on a '
                              'project (such as feature development). This '
                              'will both test and improve your software design '
                              'skills, management skills, and communication '
                              'techniques.<br><br>Deployment to production or '
                              'another environment is performed via a robust '
                              'CI connected to GitHub and GitLab. No one will '
                              'force you to examine our CIs but you can. You '
                              'are, however, expected to be able to handle the '
                              'code. As for the rest, our CI will take care of '
                              'deployment on the staging environment and, '
                              'later, on production, it will comment on your '
                              "Jira ticket regarding the changes… you don't "
                              'have to worry about it. There’s no running jobs '
                              'or moving files manually. We are currently '
                              'using the GitFlow model, but we are gradually '
                              'preparing our applications for Continuous '
                              'Delivery (we started with '
                              'Dashboards).<br><br>To keep ourselves '
                              'organized, we use powerful, albeit sometimes '
                              'complicated, Jira. We store our internal '
                              'documents in Confluence. You can choose a '
                              'Macbook or a Lenovo Linux machine, and we let '
                              'you pick your favorite development environment '
                              '(most people run it in VS Code or IntelliJ '
                              'IDEA).<br><br>Once in a fortnight, the whole '
                              'frontend dev community meets to discuss our '
                              'pains and brainstorms over solutions. Every two '
                              'months, we gather for a full-day meetup, either '
                              'in Prague or Brno, always finishing with a beer '
                              'or two. Covid made it complicated but we '
                              'soldier on with Zoom (except for the '
                              'beer).<br><br>Other than that, you can join our '
                              'annual hackathon, an offsite (first '
                              'presentations, then a HUGE party), conference '
                              'days, Christmas and other assorted parties. '
                              'With our GoodLife program, you can go jogging, '
                              'go-karting, practice yoga, try your skills at '
                              'exit games, get wet in a kayak, or come up with '
                              'another strange activity. And then there are '
                              'monthly pub nights when drinks are on the '
                              'company’s check. It’s not mandatory but… you '
                              "know :)<br><br>Oh, the best of all… we don't "
                              'support Windows and MSIE '
                              '❤️<br><br><strong>That’s enough, I wanna work '
                              'with you ✅</strong> or Ask us anything at TNT '
                              'team’s Discord '
                              '✋<br><br><strong>Summary<br><br></strong>How '
                              'you’re going to spend your time '
                              '⏱<br><br><ul><li>Develop new product features '
                              'for Analytical Designer, Dashboards and '
                              'Gooddata.UI</li><li>Research and exterminate '
                              'bugs</li><li>Work with our UI and UX teams on '
                              'overall feature designs</li><li>Fine tune the '
                              'tools to improve developer '
                              'experience</li><li>Lift up the team '
                              'spirit<br></li></ul>What you should know '
                              '💪<br><br><ul><li>TypeScript and '
                              'JavaScript</li><li>Develop SPA and web apps '
                              'over a UI library - ideally '
                              'React</li><li>Master Git a dev '
                              'environment</li><li>Work for a couple of hours '
                              'straight without jumping over to Stack '
                              'Overflow</li><li>Voice your opinion, make your '
                              'case, reason logically… and all that in English '
                              'as we’re quite international over '
                              'here</li><li>Learn<br></li></ul>What you’re '
                              'gonna get 🎁<br><br><ul><li>New team and a new '
                              'boss</li><li>Work on improving a stable and '
                              'excellent product. You’ll make your mom '
                              'proud!</li><li>Chance to learn new things (a '
                              'lot of new things at the '
                              'beginning)</li><li>Chance to destroy your '
                              'colleagues in fussball and/or on '
                              'Playstation</li><li>Chance to indecisively '
                              'stare into a full fridge several times a '
                              'day</li><li>5 weeks of vacation and 6 sick '
                              'days</li><li>Your own laptop - a MacBook nebo '
                              'or a Linux Lenovo</li><li>GoodData mobile plan '
                              'and any phone you like (don’t worry, we won’t '
                              'call you at 10pm to repair '
                              'something)</li><li>Stock '
                              'options</li><li>Monthly contribution to your '
                              'benefit account - good for cinemas, gym, or '
                              'Pampers</li><li>Meal contribution - we don’t do '
                              'meal vouchers (aka stravenky)</li><li>Other '
                              'goodies<br></li></ul>We don’t bite '
                              '😁<br><br><ul><li>Apply for the job.</li><li>Our '
                              'HR’s Jitka will get in touch.</li><li>Your new '
                              'boss will speak to you.</li><li>You’ll show off '
                              'your skills in front of some team '
                              'members.</li><li>If either of us is not sure, '
                              'we’ll have lunch. Or a beer. Or '
                              'both.</li><li>When everyone’s happy… welcome '
                              'aboard!<br><br></li></ul><strong>If you prefer '
                              'an informal touch, just get in touch with us on '
                              'our </strong><strong>Team TNT Discord '
                              'Channel</strong><strong> ✋</strong>\n'

          'description_text': 'Description\n'
                              'We’re Team TNT 🧨 and our mission is to take '
                              'care of single page UI applications written in '
                              'React a TypeScript that ran over the GoodData '
                              'platform.\n'
                              'We’re looking for onsite/remote developers '
                              'who’d help us push our team, product, '
                              'architecture, and codebase forward. We’re not '
                              'looking for someone to occupy an office chair. '
                              'We want to team with people who want their work '
                              'to make sense, who are on the lookout for new '
                              'challenges. Sure, your knowledge of the tech '
                              'craft is important. Your attitude and '
                              'willingness to open-minded problem solving is '
                              'more important still.\n'
                              'Read on to learn more about us and what we’re '
                              'working on. If you’re not too keen on reading, '
                              'scroll down to the recap ⬇️, or head over to '
                              'Discord ✋ and ask as anything.\n'
                              'Meet the TNT\n'
                              'Headcount? Eight full-time front-end and full '
                              'stack devs, two interns, and one manager - '
                              'luckily, a former front-end dev. We’re kept in '
                              'line by Scrum Master Privilege, our Product '
                              'Owner is Rosťa, then there’s UX Designer Petr, '
                              'Lubo the Architect, and a team of QA testers.\n'
                              'We all share an office at the GoodData Brno '
                              'site and, typically, we meet on an everyday '
                              'basis. Which is great. We do realize that '
                              'Covid-19 changed the world so don’t worry, if '
                              'you prefer to work from home, we’ll still have '
                              'a place for you. Just pop in once in a while '
                              'for a chat or a beer. We help each other, we '
                              'learn together, we share our worries, and '
                              'respect our boundaries.\n'
                              'Some of us don’t speak Czech so English is our '
                              'lingua franca. We’re patient, though, if '
                              'someone takes time to find the right words.\n'
                              'Based on the roles’ descriptions, it may look '
                              'like we’re working in Scrum but that’s not the '
                              "case. While we do deploy some of Scrum's "
                              'methods, we’re using our own simple framework '
                              'that we call Restart, which is inspired by the '
                              'Shape UP methodology.\n'

                              'corporate twang. But guess what. It’s for our '

                              'FI MUNI student, fast-learning enthusiast. '
                              'We’re working on getting more information out '
                              'of him.\n'
                              'Petr Janů\n'
                              'Manager, 4 years at GD\n'
                              'Former front end developer who likes to have '
                              'things in order. A DIY aficionado taking breaks '
                              'from the tools to take his family to explore '
                              'nature.\n'
                              'What we’re working on\n'
                              'There are essentially two applications we work '
                              'on most of the time - Analytical Designer and '
                              'Dashboards. These Business Intelligence '
                              'applications make everyday work easier for '
                              'approximately 16,000 active users - they allow '
                              'them to easily and clearly display current data '
                              'and use it to make the right decisions. We have '
                              'been in charge of both applications for several '
                              'years and we don’t plan to just say goodbye to '
                              'them. Our platform is quite complex and we '
                              'won’t lie to you - it takes a few weeks or '
                              'months to get comfortably familiar with '
                              'everything.\n'
                              'On top of those two apps, we work on our SDK '
                              'package Gooddata.UI changing it almost every '
                              'day. GoodData.UI is the foundation of nearly '
                              'all of our UI apps that are developed by our '
                              'colleagues in Prague. Once in a while, we have '
                              'an opportunity to develop a brand new app from '
                              'scratch and deploy it onto our Immutable '
                              'Infrastructure. But most of the time we modify, '
                              'polish, and tune our favorite Analytical '
                              'Designer and Dashboards.\n'
                              'Analytical Designer\n'
                              'Analytical Designer allows you to create ad hoc '
                              'reports and analysis over your, or your '
                              'customers’, data. Most of it is drag-and-drop '
                              'and there’s a ton of settings. Analytical '
                              'Designer builds on Gooddata.UI SDK and uses '
                              'REST API to talk to one of our two backends (a '
                              'hosted platform or your own on-site deployed '
                              'GoodData.CN). Intrigued? You can give it a try '
                              'yourself using a free account option.\n'
                              'Tech stack: TypeScript, React + Redux + Saga, '
                              'Jest + Enzyme, TestCafe.\n'
                              'Dashboards\n'
                              'Once you create your own insights in Analytical '
                              'Designer, it’s time to present them in a neat '
                              'dashboard, label it, apply filters and share '
                              'with the interested parties. Such as your boss '
                              ':) This is what the Dashboards app is for. The '
                              'target audience differs from the one of '
                              'Analytical Designer, but it’s also built over '
                              'the SDK, it talks to both backends, and uses '
                              'the same tech. That too is available in our '
                              'Free pricing plan.\n'
                              'Tech stack: TypeScript, React + Redux + Saga, '
                              'Jest + Enzyme, Cypress.\n'
                              'GoodData.UI\n'
                              'GoodData.UI is a JavaScript/TypeScript SDK that '
                              'helps your customers build their own UI '
                              'applications over the GoodData platform. The '
                              'library is open source and it’s owned by our '
                              'Prague colleagues. However, as GoodData.UI '
                              'effectively forms the chassis for our '
                              'Analytical Designer and Dashboards, we '
                              'regularly contribute with new ‘books’. See '
                              'GoodData.UI for more information.\n'
                              'Tech stack: TypeScript, React + Redux + Saga, '
                              'Jest + Enzyme, Storybook + Backstop, Cypress.\n'
                              'What you need to know as a developer...\n'
                              'We use TypeScript everywhere, otherwise our '
                              'apps would be difficult to manage. If you don’t '
                              'have a full command of TypeScript, don’t worry, '
                              'we’re not closing the door in front of you. '
                              'You’ll just have to master it quickly :)\n'
                              'Our UI is built on React. We use Redux for '
                              'state management and Redux Saga for side '
                              "effects. If you've never worked with React "
                              "(Hello World doesn't count), again, it doesn't "
                              'matter. If you are familiar with another '
                              'library or framework and have a positive '
                              'attitude towards React, it will be enough. Just '
                              'be aware that we’re not too keen to listen to '
                              'how Angular is much better all day long :) But '
                              'you can try to convince us.\n'
                              'For testing, we use Jest, Enzyme, and Backstop. '
                              'For E2E tests, there’s Cypress, into which we '
                              'migrate older TestCafe tests. Cypress simply '
                              'suits us better. Oh, yeah, we test routinely '
                              "and almost everything. If you don't have much "
                              'experience with testing, no problem - we will '
                              'teach you.\n'
                              'Manual testing is conducted by our QA team in '
                              'Vietnam. We work with three technically very '
                              'skilled QA engineers on a daily basis.\n'
                              'We keep our code in GitHub although some parts '
                              'are on GitLab. Working with Git is unavoidable '
                              'and we expect you to be able to commit and '
                              'rebase at least. We do code reviews for ALL '
                              'changes in the code - nothing can be merged '
                              'without a peer review. This and using pair '
                              'programming allows us to share knowledge and '
                              'maintain code quality. This will allow you to '
                              'work with people who can teach you a lot. And '
                              'if you dare, you can be tasked to be a lead on '
                              'a project (such as feature development). This '
                              'will both test and improve your software design '
                              'skills, management skills, and communication '
                              'techniques.\n'
                              'Deployment to production or another environment '
                              'is performed via a robust CI connected to '
                              'GitHub and GitLab. No one will force you to '
                              'examine our CIs but you can. You are, however, '
                              'expected to be able to handle the code. As for '
                              'the rest, our CI will take care of deployment '
                              'on the staging environment and, later, on '
                              'production, it will comment on your Jira ticket '
                              "regarding the changes… you don't have to worry "
                              'about it. There’s no running jobs or moving '
                              'files manually. We are currently using the '
                              'GitFlow model, but we are gradually preparing '
                              'our applications for Continuous Delivery (we '
                              'started with Dashboards).\n'
                              'To keep ourselves organized, we use powerful, '
                              'albeit sometimes complicated, Jira. We store '
                              'our internal documents in Confluence. You can '
                              'choose a Macbook or a Lenovo Linux machine, and '
                              'we let you pick your favorite development '
                              'environment (most people run it in VS Code or '
                              'IntelliJ IDEA).\n'
                              'Once in a fortnight, the whole frontend dev '
                              'community meets to discuss our pains and '
                              'brainstorms over solutions. Every two months, '
                              'we gather for a full-day meetup, either in '
                              'Prague or Brno, always finishing with a beer or '
                              'two. Covid made it complicated but we soldier '
                              'on with Zoom (except for the beer).\n'
                              'Other than that, you can join our annual '
                              'hackathon, an offsite (first presentations, '
                              'then a HUGE party), conference days, Christmas '
                              'and other assorted parties. With our GoodLife '
                              'program, you can go jogging, go-karting, '
                              'practice yoga, try your skills at exit games, '
                              'get wet in a kayak, or come up with another '
                              'strange activity. And then there are monthly '
                              'pub nights when drinks are on the company’s '
                              'check. It’s not mandatory but… you know :)\n'

                              'budeš dělat\xa0</h2><ul><li>Pracovat s nástroji '
                              'pro webovou analytiku jako Google Analytics '
                              'nebo Google Tag Manager</li><li>Definovat cíle '
                              'online projektů a nastavovat jejich '
                              'měření</li><li>Vizualizovat data v Data Studiu '
                              'nebo Power BI</li><li>Vyhodnocovat výkon webu, '
                              'kampaní nebo AB testovat '
                              'stránky</li></ul><p>Víme, že žádný učený z nebe '
                              'nespadl – pod křídla si tě vezmou zkušenější '
                              'kolegové a se vším ti pomůžou. Na oplátku ale '
                              'čekáme pořádný zápal.\xa0</p><h2 '
                              'style="margin-top:2rem;margin-bottom:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;color:rgb(48,182,111);">Koho '
                              'potřebujeme</h2><ul><li><strong>Nadšence do '
                              'analytiky a čísel</strong>. Musíš se zvládnout '
                              'zorientovat v nastavení analytiky webu, '
                              'prohlédnout data a upozornit na případné '
                              'nedostatky. K tomu patří i vizualizace a '
                              'vyhodnocení výsledků. Budou se ti hodit základy '
                              'HTML a JavaScriptu, ale nemusíš být žádný '
                              'nabušený programátor.</li><li>Učenlivého '
                              'kolegu. Pokud bude spolupráce fungovat, do '
                              'budoucna nám <strong>můžeš pomáhat budovat '
                              'vlastní analytické nástroje, nasazovat měřící '
                              'kódy nebo řešit data science</strong>. V '
                              'případě, že tě zajímá <strong>marketing, '
                              'automatizace, machine learning a AI,</strong> '
                              'můžeš se u nás posouvat i tímhle '
                              'směrem.</li><li>Spolehlivého parťáka. Aktuálně '
                              '<strong>hledáme výpomoc na part-time</strong>, '
                              'bude to zhruba 60 hodin měsíčně. Pokud ale '
                              'všechno půjde jako po másle, můžeme se pobavit '
                              'o práci na <strong>plný '
                              'úvazek</strong>.</li></ul><h2 '
                              'style="margin-top:2rem;margin-bottom:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;color:rgb(48,182,111);">Plusové '
                              'body (ale obejdeme se bez '
                              'toho)</h2><ul><li>Zkušenosti s Google '
                              'Analytics, GTM nebo Data Studio</li><li>Základy '
                              'v SQL, Pythonu nebo '
                              'Rku</li><li>Vzdělání/zkušenosti/zájmy spojené s '
                              'BI, e‑commerce, online marketingem, statistikou '
                              'nebo webovou analytikou</li></ul><h2 '
                              'style="margin-top:2rem;margin-bottom:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;color:rgb(48,182,111);">Co '
                              'ti nabídneme</h2><ul><li><strong>Stabilní '
                              'tým</strong> po čertech šikovných markeťáků. '
                              'Všichni táhneme za jeden provaz.\xa0'
                              '</li><li><strong>Zadar\xadmo to '
                              'neb\xadude</strong>. Samozře\xadj\xadmostí je '
                              'adekvátní mzda. Detaily probereme na '
                              'pohovoru.</li><li>CEO, který ti bude vždy '
                              'naslouchat a\xa0ocení tvoje '
                              'nápady.</li><li><strong>Zázemí '
                              'dig\xaditál\xadní agen\xadtu\xadry\xa0'
                              '</strong>s\xa0pobočkami ve 4\xa0českých '
                              'městech. Najdeš tu skvělé kafe, ovoce, pejsky, '
                              'playstation nebo třeba stolní '
                              'fotbálek.</li><li><strong>Leg\xadendární '
                              'team\xadbuild\xadingy a průběžné '
                              'vzdělávání</strong>. Interní školení, '
                              'kon\xadfer\xadence a\xa0work\xadshopy máme více '
                              'než\xa0rádi.</li><li><strong>Part-time nebo '
                              'full-time</strong>, pokud to bude dobře '
                              'fungovat. Na všem se domluvíme.</li></ul><h2 '
                              'style="margin-top:2rem;margin-bottom:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;color:rgb(48,182,111);">Kdo '
                              'jsme</h2><p>Za <strong>8 let působení v online '
                              'marketingu\xa0</strong>jsme si vydobyli jméno, '
                              'které v oboru něco znamená. Náš tým tvoří '
                              '<strong>přes 85 odborníků na online '
                              'marketing</strong> a pro každou oblast máme '
                              'specialistu, který se jí věnuje naplno. Jsme '
                              'Sklik certifikovaná agentura, patříme mezi 16 '
                              'klíčových agentur Googlu a na zdi nám visí '
                              'spousta dalších certifikátů. Pojď s námi '
                              'pracovat pro klienty jako je Direct pojišťovna, '
                              'Velux, COMFOR, Sanitino nebo třeba '
                              'Adrop.</p><h2 '
                              'style="margin-top:2rem;margin-bottom:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;color:rgb(48,182,111);">Jaké '
                              'hodnoty s\xa0námi budeš '
                              'sdílet</h2><ol><li><strong>Tým</strong> – V '
                              'PROFICIU máme společné cíle. Pomůžeme ti '
                              'zlepšovat se. Zároveň musíš i ty umět podat '
                              'pomocnou ruku. Je pro nás důležitý respekt a '
                              'otevřenost.\xa0</li><li><strong>Svoboda a '
                              'spolehlivost</strong> – Nemáme pevnou pracovní '
                              'dobu. Můžeš pracovat z domu, kavárny nebo od '
                              'bazénu. O to zodpovědnější přístup ale '
                              'očekáváme.</li><li><strong>Proklientský '
                              'přístup</strong> – Záleží ti na tom, aby naše '
                              'práce dávala smysl a klientovi se z '
                              'dlouhodobého hlediska vyplácela. Náš zákazník, '
                              'náš '
                              'partner.</li><li><strong>Entuziasmus</strong> – '
                              'Proaktivita, zájem, nasazení. Aktivně přicházíš '

                              'Přidej se k našemu analytickému týmu! Hledáme '

language_filter
ENGLISH_REQUIRED Klienti z česka i zahraničí (AJ min B2 + RU)
⇢ \bAJ\b
 features_parser
ENGLISH_REQUIRED Jo a protože část naší firmy nemluví česky, bez angličtiny se tu také neobejdeš.
⇢ \b(angličtin\w+|anglick\w+)\b
 features_parser
LEARNING_REQUIRED Máš alespoň lehkou zkušenost na obdobné pozici a chceš se rozvíjet dál
⇢ \b(chce\w*|chtěj\w*|chtít|chuť|ochot\w+|schopn\w+)[\b\W](.+[\b\W])?(učit|na sobě|rozvíj\w+)\b
 features_parser
LEARNING_REQUIRED S týmem si sedneš, pokud máš pořád chuť se učit nové věci a nebereš se tak úplně vážně
⇢ \b(chce\w*|chtěj\w*|chtít|chuť|ochot\w+|schopn\w+)[\b\W](.+[\b\W])?(učit|na sobě|rozvíj\w+)\b
 features_parser

                     'helpdesk/frontdesk/zendesk/youtrack atp. \xa0<br />S '
                     'týmem si sedneš, pokud máš pořád chuť se učit nové věci '
                     'a nebereš se tak úplně vážně. Když něco nevíš, nebojíš '
                     'se zeptat. Baví tě komunikace s klienty a dokážeš si '
                     'poradit s problémem, který není popsaný v dokumentaci. '
                     'Pokud budeš chtít, můžeš se podílet i na rozvoji '
                     'helpdesku nebo automatizaci – jak procesů tak QA. '
                     '<strong>Umíš rusky, a to alespoň na úrovni B2.</strong> '
                     'Jo a protože část naší firmy nemluví česky, bez '
                     'angličtiny se tu také neobejdeš.<br /><br '

                     'uvažoval/a.</li><li> Rádi se na pracovišti zkoušejí nové '

                     'primárně v C# (tohle je nezbytné plus) ale F# není na '
                     'pracovišti také cizí („nice to have“, ale netrváme na '
                     'tom).</li><li> Návrh služeb je pomocí principů SOA, '
                     'microservices (tohle je menší plus).</li><li> Na '
                     'komunikaci dohlíží Service Bus služba – RabbitMQ (to se '

                     'organizace práce, proto by bylo dobré, aby ses uměl '
                     'orientovat buď v těchto, nebo v podobných nástrojích pro '
                     'řízení projektů.</li><li> Pro vývoj frontend aplikací je '
                     'používán React.<br></li></ul><strong><u>Co Ti '

                     'na IČO.</li><li> Zaměstnancům je nabízen standardní '

                              'Hledáme<br></u></strong><ul><li> Člověka, který '
                              'se aktivně podílí na řešení zadání – od sběru '
                              'požadavků až po nasazení aplikace. Tedy někoho, '
                              'kdo se nebojí zjišťovat informace a ptát se '
                              'těch správných lidí.</li><li> V tuto chvíli náš '
                              'klient přechází na agilní vývoj, a tak '
                              'potřebuje, abys tímto způsobem také '
                              'uvažoval/a.</li><li> Rádi se na pracovišti '
                              'zkoušejí nové věci, i nový kolega by měl mít '
                              'objevitelského ducha.<br></li></ul>S jakými '
                              'nástroji budeš pracovat a do jaké míry bys je '
                              'měl umět používat:<br><ul><li> Mozek – mnohem '
                              'důležitější než to, kolik softwarových toolů '
                              'znáš, je pro nás způsob, jakým uvažuješ a do '
                              'jaké míry jsi proaktivní v hledání '
                              'řešení.</li><li> Vyvoj je primárně v C# (tohle '
                              'je nezbytné plus) ale F# není na pracovišti '
                              'také cizí („nice to have“, ale netrváme na '
                              'tom).</li><li> Návrh služeb je pomocí principů '
                              'SOA, microservices (tohle je menší '
                              'plus).</li><li> Na komunikaci dohlíží Service '
                              'Bus služba – RabbitMQ (to se kdyžtak naučíš v '
                              'průběhu).</li><li> Pro ukládání dat se používá '
                              'MSSQL a MongoDB (tohle je úplně normální '
                              'plus).</li><li> Měl/a bys znát princip '
                              'fungování webových aplikací (HTTP, REST '
                              'API).</li><li> Pro uložení kódu používáme GIT '
                              '(to se kdyžtak také naučíš).</li><li> Tvorba '
                              'technické dokumentace je v češtině, s novými '
                              'informacemi si ale budeš muset poradit v '
                              'angličtině.</li><li> Confluence a Jira – základ '
                              'organizace práce, proto by bylo dobré, aby ses '
                              'uměl orientovat buď v těchto, nebo v podobných '
                              'nástrojích pro řízení projektů.</li><li> Pro '
                              'vývoj frontend aplikací je používán '
                              'React.<br></li></ul><strong><u>Co Ti '
                              'Nabízíme<br></u></strong><ul><li> Budeš mít '
                              'přímý podíl na projektech, které pomáhají našim '
                              'klientům v každodenním životě.</li><li> Možnost '
                              'spolupráce na HPP i na IČO.</li><li> '
                              'Zaměstnancům je nabízen standardní balíček '
                              'benefitů jako je týden dovolené navíc, sick '
                              'days, stravenky, Flexi Passy, flexibilní '
                              'pracovní doba, kurzy angličtiny, dotovaná '
                              'Multisport karta, firemní sleva na nákup '
                              'elektroniky, zvýhodněný rodinný tarif na '
                              'volání/data atd.</li><li> Dog-friendly '
                              'office</li><li> Ve firmě vládne hodně rodinná a '
                              'pohodová atmosféra, kolegové se rádi výdají i '
                              've volném čase. Jakmile to situace umožní, rádi '
                              'tě vezmou někam na vodu, na lyže, můžeš s nimi '
                              'zaběhnout i maraton, nebo prostě jen zajít po '

 'description_html': '<p><strong>Backend developer junior</strong></p><p>Do '
                     'svého týmu hledáme mladého a energického Backend '
                     'developera co ovládá TypeScript nebo JavaScript. Baví tě '
                     'práce na novém \xa0projektu? Jsi zapálený do řešení '
                     'problémů? Pak hledáme právě Tebe!</p><p><strong>Co '
                     'děláme\xa0</strong></p><p>Sjednáváme hypotéky online a '
                     'děláme vše proto, abychom lidem zjednodušili, '
                     'zpříjemnili a zrychlili proces vyřizování '
                     '<strong>hypotéky</strong>. Naše služba díky zapojení '
                     'moderních technologií dokáže <strong>rychle</strong> '
                     'porovnat parametry jednotlivých hypoték na trhu, najít '
                     '<strong>nejlepší nabídky</strong> a nastavit pro klienta '
                     'dlouhodobě výhodné podmínky. S námi si lidé vyřídí '
                     'hypotéku během jednoho dne <strong>online z pohodlí '
                     'domova</strong>.</p><p><strong>Co tě '
                     'čeká?</strong></p><ul><li>možnost podílet se na '
                     'unikátním projektu</li><li>skvělý IT tým a velmi mladý '
                     'kolektiv</li><li>vývoj naší webové '
                     'aplikace</li><li>každý den něco '
                     'nového</li></ul><p><strong>Náš backendový '
                     'techstack</strong></p><ul><li>Node.js</li><li>ExpressJS</li><li>MongoDB</li></ul><p><strong>Co '
                     'ti můžeme nabídnout?\xa0'
                     '</strong></p><ul><li>full-time/part-time '
                     'úvazek</li><li>možnost remote nebo zázemí moderní '
                     'kanceláře v Brně</li><li>možnost práce jako '
                     'freelancer</li><li>Multisport kartu, pravidelné '
                     'teambuildingy, společné oslavy</li><li>30 - 60.000,- pro '
                     'full-time</li></ul><p><strong>Co bys měl/a '
                     'umět?</strong></p><ul><li><strong>TypeScript</strong> na '
                     'pokročilé úrovni - v případě znalosti JavaScriptu nebo '
                     'jiných OOP jazyků doučíme</li><li>ovládáš verzovací '

                              'Tobě i o Tvé práci, která Tě u nás čeká a '
                              'zjistíš více o naší společnosti MioWeb s.r.o. '
                              'Výběru lidí do našeho týmu věnujeme spoustu '
                              'času a energie, protože hodně investujeme do '
                              'každého člověka, kterého do našeho týmu '
                              'přijmeme. Proto nám, prosím, neposílej svou '
                              'přihlášku, pokud nemáš opravdu vážný zájem.',

 'company_logo_path': None,
 'company_name': 'AT&T',
 'description_html': '<p>AT&amp;T has been changing the way people live, work, '
                     'and play for more than 140 years. It started with '
                     'Alexander Graham Bell’s telephone. Since then, our '
                     'legacy of innovation has included the invention of the '
                     'transistor – the building block of today’s digital world '
                     '– as well as the solar cell, the communications '
                     'satellite and machine learning. Today, we are leading '
                     'the industry in cutting edge networking technologies '
                     'such as Software Defined Networking, Disaggregated '
                     'Network Operating Systems and High-Speed Optical Network '
                     'Connections. We were just recently awarded “America’s '
                     'Best 5G Network” by Global Wireless Solutions and have '
                     'been ranked #1 in Fiber Broadband Customer Satisfaction '
                     'by J.D. Power.  AT&amp;T Labs, a global leader in '
                     'telecommunications research and development, has been at '
                     'the heart of these incredible achievements – drawing on '
                     'an unparalleled 140-year heritage of creation and '
                     'innovation.</p>\n'
                     '<p>The AT&amp;T Labs Network Systems Business Unit is '
                     'responsible for development and maintenance of AT&amp;Ts '
                     'Network Operational Support Systems (OSS) – the software '
                     'applications that manage AT&amp;Ts network. Because of '
                     'our unique position as the “glue” between the network '
                     'and IT, our Software Engineers and Architects are '
                     'experts in both networking AND software development '
                     'technology, generating over 50 U.S. patents per year on '
                     'topics like Intent-based Networking, Self-assembly of '
                     'Virtual Network Functions, and Artificial Intelligence '
                     'applied to network management.</p>\n'
                     '<p>This position is required for AT&amp;T’s Network '
                     'transformation strategic direction since today and going '
                     'forward NEO has greater need for innovation with Network '
                     'Strategy &amp; Support, 5G, Fiber to provide high-value '
                     'technology and solutions. The role will influence the '
                     'delivery of system automation capabilities across '
                     'AT&amp;T enterprise architects, engineers, and managers '
                     'across business units within the whole company. It will '
                     'drive delivery of system automation enablers for key CTO '
                     'and business initiatives 5G, RAN, 5G Core/NC, FN, SDN, '
                     'Fiber, ROADM, Win Home. This includes driving towards a '
                     'single source of truth network inventory platform '
                     'enabled by leading industry CMDB platforms. This role '
                     'will be integral in the Network Transformation '
                     'initiatives driving new strategies, implementation of '
                     'tooling and leading change.</p>\n'
                     '<h2 id="job-role">Job Role</h2>\n'
                     '<ul>\n'
                     '<li>Works closely with the Solution Architects and '
                     'System Engineers to ensure that overall program and '
                     'product strategies align with business and technical '
                     'objectives</li>\n'
                     '<li>The key focus is to enable the automation of '
                     'organization in all facets including but not limited to '
                     'the following areas: development, quality assurance, and '
                     'solution engineering.</li>\n'
                     '<li>Responsible for the creation of new technology '
                     'infrastructures and maintains configuration management '
                     'and automation tools.</li>\n'
                     '<li>Facilitates important test design decisions for SAFe '
                     'Trains, business unit projects &amp; program '
                     'needs.</li>\n'
                     '<li>This role will be data driven and require metrics to '
                     'be produced to show an increased efficiency in the '
                     'organization.</li>\n'
                     '<li>This position is within Network Systems and '
                     'technologies that enable the transformation of AT&amp;T '
                     'leading edge networks and services, such as 5G and fiber '
                     'broadband.</li>\n'
                     '<li>Must be coupled with strong industry standard '
                     'tooling knowledge and the strategic direction of '
                     'automation.</li>\n'
                     '</ul>\n'
                     '<h2 id="principal-responsibilities">Principal '
                     'Responsibilities</h2>\n'
                     '<ul>\n'
                     '<li>Participate in planning, definition, and high-level '
                     'design of the system solution and explore '
                     'alternatives</li>\n'
                     '<li>Develop, analyze, split, and realize the '
                     'implementation applications</li>\n'
                     '<li>Participate in project planning, system and solution '
                     'demos, retrospective workshops</li>\n'
                     '<li>Understand technical characteristics of and assist '
                     'with integration of external components, systems, and '
                     'platforms</li>\n'
                     '</ul>\n'
                     '<h2 id="skills">Skills</h2>\n'
                     '<ul>\n'

                     '(knowledge of at least one language at university '
                     'level)</li>\n'
                     '<li>Experience with Agile, DevOps methodology</li>\n'
                     '<li>Interest in emerging technologies, trends, and '
                     'directions</li>\n'
                     '<li>Knowledge of network principles, operating systems, '
                     'and environments</li>\n'

                     '(SOA)</li>\n'

                     '<li>Position suitable also for University '

          'description_text': 'AT&T has been changing the way people live, '
                              'work, and play for more than 140 years. It '
                              'started with Alexander Graham Bell’s telephone. '
                              'Since then, our legacy of innovation has '
                              'included the invention of the transistor – the '
                              'building block of today’s digital world – as '
                              'well as the solar cell, the communications '
                              'satellite and machine learning. Today, we are '
                              'leading the industry in cutting edge networking '
                              'technologies such as Software Defined '
                              'Networking, Disaggregated Network Operating '
                              'Systems and High-Speed Optical Network '
                              'Connections. We were just recently awarded '
                              '“America’s Best 5G Network” by Global Wireless '
                              'Solutions and have been ranked #1 in Fiber '
                              'Broadband Customer Satisfaction by J.D. Power. '
                              'AT&T Labs, a global leader in '
                              'telecommunications research and development, '
                              'has been at the heart of these incredible '
                              'achievements – drawing on an unparalleled '
                              '140-year heritage of creation and innovation.\n'
                              'The AT&T Labs Network Systems Business Unit is '
                              'responsible for development and maintenance of '
                              'AT&Ts Network Operational Support Systems (OSS) '
                              '– the software applications that manage AT&Ts '
                              'network. Because of our unique position as the '
                              '“glue” between the network and IT, our Software '
                              'Engineers and Architects are experts in both '
                              'networking AND software development technology, '
                              'generating over 50 U.S. patents per year on '
                              'topics like Intent-based Networking, '
                              'Self-assembly of Virtual Network Functions, and '
                              'Artificial Intelligence applied to network '
                              'management.\n'
                              'This position is required for AT&T’s Network '
                              'transformation strategic direction since today '
                              'and going forward NEO has greater need for '
                              'innovation with Network Strategy & Support, 5G, '
                              'Fiber to provide high-value technology and '
                              'solutions. The role will influence the delivery '
                              'of system automation capabilities across AT&T '
                              'enterprise architects, engineers, and managers '
                              'across business units within the whole company. '
                              'It will drive delivery of system automation '
                              'enablers for key CTO and business initiatives '
                              '5G, RAN, 5G Core/NC, FN, SDN, Fiber, ROADM, Win '
                              'Home. This includes driving towards a single '
                              'source of truth network inventory platform '
                              'enabled by leading industry CMDB platforms. '
                              'This role will be integral in the Network '
                              'Transformation initiatives driving new '
                              'strategies, implementation of tooling and '
                              'leading change.\n'
                              'Job Role\n'
                              'Works closely with the Solution Architects and '
                              'System Engineers to ensure that overall program '
                              'and product strategies align with business and '
                              'technical objectives\n'
                              'The key focus is to enable the automation of '
                              'organization in all facets including but not '
                              'limited to the following areas: development, '
                              'quality assurance, and solution engineering.\n'
                              'Responsible for the creation of new technology '
                              'infrastructures and maintains configuration '
                              'management and automation tools.\n'
                              'Facilitates important test design decisions for '
                              'SAFe Trains, business unit projects & program '
                              'needs.\n'
                              'This role will be data driven and require '
                              'metrics to be produced to show an increased '
                              'efficiency in the organization.\n'
                              'This position is within Network Systems and '
                              'technologies that enable the transformation of '
                              'AT&T leading edge networks and services, such '
                              'as 5G and fiber broadband.\n'
                              'Must be coupled with strong industry standard '
                              'tooling knowledge and the strategic direction '
                              'of automation.\n'
                              'Principal Responsibilities\n'
                              'Participate in planning, definition, and '
                              'high-level design of the system solution and '
                              'explore alternatives\n'
                              'Develop, analyze, split, and realize the '
                              'implementation applications\n'
                              'Participate in project planning, system and '
                              'solution demos, retrospective workshops\n'
                              'Understand technical characteristics of and '
                              'assist with integration of external components, '
                              'systems, and platforms\n'
                              'Skills\n'
                              'Programming Languages - JavaScript, Python '
                              '(knowledge of at least one language at '
                              'university level)\n'
                              'Experience with Agile, DevOps methodology\n'
                              'Interest in emerging technologies, trends, and '
                              'directions\n'
                              'Knowledge of network principles, operating '
                              'systems, and environments\n'
                              'Experience with Service Oriented Architecture '
                              '(SOA)\n'
                              'System and Technology Integration\n'
                              'Position suitable also for University '
                              'Graduates\n'
                              'Education\n'
                              'Preferred Bachelor of Science degree in '
                              'Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Applied '
                              'Science, Electrical Engineering, or Math, or '
                              'equivalent experience.\n'
                              'Employee Benefits\n'
                              'An annual financial bonus\n'
                              'Salary increase every year\n'
                              '25 days of vacation\n'
                              '135 CZK meal voucher\n'
                              'Initial comprehensive training\n'
                              'Premium medical plan at Canadian Medicals '
                              'center\n'
                              'Contribution in pension plan, life risk '
                              'insurance\n'
                              'Language courses and other external and '
                              'internal trainings\n'
                              'ActivePass card and FlexiPass vouchers (Sodexo '
                              'Cafeteria)',

 'description_html': '<p>AT&amp;T has been changing the way people live, work, '
                     'and play for more than 140 years. It started with '
                     'Alexander Graham Bell’s telephone. Since then, our '
                     'legacy of innovation has included the invention of the '
                     'transistor – the building block of today’s digital world '
                     '– as well as the solar cell, the communications '
                     'satellite and machine learning. Today, we are leading '
                     'the industry in cutting edge networking technologies '
                     'such as Software Defined Networking, Disaggregated '
                     'Network Operating Systems and High-Speed Optical Network '
                     'Connections. We were just recently awarded “America’s '
                     'Best 5G Network” by Global Wireless Solutions and have '
                     'been ranked #1 in Fiber Broadband Customer Satisfaction '
                     'by J.D. Power.  AT&amp;T Labs, a global leader in '
                     'telecommunications research and development, has been at '
                     'the heart of these incredible achievements – drawing on '
                     'an unparalleled 140-year heritage of creation and '
                     'innovation.</p>\n'
                     '<p>The AT&amp;T Labs Network Systems Business Unit is '
                     'responsible for development and maintenance of AT&amp;Ts '
                     'Network Operational Support Systems (OSS) – the software '
                     'applications that manage AT&amp;Ts network. Because of '
                     'our unique position as the “glue” between the network '
                     'and IT, our Software Engineers and Architects are '
                     'experts in both networking AND software development '
                     'technology, generating over 50 U.S. patents per year on '
                     'topics like Intent-based Networking, Self-assembly of '
                     'Virtual Network Functions, and Artificial Intelligence '
                     'applied to network management.\n'
                     'This position is required for AT&amp;T’s Network '
                     'transformation strategic direction since today and going '
                     'forward NEO has greater need for innovation with Network '
                     'Strategy &amp; Support, 5G, Fiber to provide high-value '
                     'technology and solutions. The role will influence the '
                     'delivery of system automation capabilities across '
                     'AT&amp;T enterprise architects, engineers, and managers '
                     'across business units within the whole company. It will '
                     'drive delivery of system automation enablers for key CTO '
                     'and business initiatives 5G, RAN, 5G Core/NC, FN, SDN, '
                     'Fiber, ROADM, Win Home. This includes driving towards a '
                     'single source of truth network inventory platform '
                     'enabled by leading industry CMDB platforms. This role '
                     'will be integral in the Network Transformation '
                     'initiatives driving new strategies, implementation of '
                     'tooling and leading change.</p>\n'

                     'and automation tools.</li>\n'

                     'organization in all facets including but not limited to '
                     'the following areas: development, quality assurance, and '
                     'solution engineering.</li>\n'
                     '<li>This role will be data driven and require metrics to '
                     'be produced to show an increased efficiency in the '
                     'organization.</li>\n'
                     '<li>This position is a Software Developer for Network '
                     'Systems and technologies that will enable the '
                     'transformation of AT&amp;T leading edge networks and '
                     'services, such as 5G and fiber broadband.</li>\n'
                     '<li>Must be coupled with strong industry standard '
                     'tooling knowledge and the strategic direction of '
                     'automation.</li>\n'

                              'time.<br><br>Have a passion for web application '
                              'development? Do you want to work with guidance '
                              'of more senior engineers to design, code and '
                              'test applications that meet functional and '
                              'business requirements?<br><br>If yes, then we '
                              'might be looking right for you!<br><br>What we '
                              'expect:<br><br><ul><li>Consultative nature, '
                              'strong analytical, mathematical and problem '
                              'solving skills</li><li>Ability to learn '
                              'quickly, be self-motivated, demonstrate '
                              'initiative, and adapt in a dynamic '
                              'environment</li><li>English language skills '
                              '(written and spoken) at a professional level, '
                              'Czech language skills at intermediate '
                              'level.</li><li>Passion for learning new '
                              'technologies</li><li>Ability to share your '
                              'ideas and be part of '
                              'discussions<br><br></li></ul>Your '
                              'skills:<br><br><ul><li>Experience with C# '
                              'programming language, ASP. Net Core and in '
                              "building RESTful Web API's,</li><li>Knowledge "
                              'of OOP design principles</li><li>Experience '
                              'with source code control (eg. Git)</li><li>Good '
                              'knowledge of SQL or T-SQL</li><li>Knowledge of '
                              'Azure Cloud and SQL Server is an '
                              'advantage</li><li>Knowledge of web technologie '
                              '(e.g. HTML5, CSS, JavaScript) is an '
                              'advantage</li><li>Knowledge of Azure DevOps and '
                              'agile programming techniques is an '
                              'advantage<br><br></li></ul>We '
                              'offer:<br><br><ul><li>Exposure to a variety of '
                              'project &amp; technologies (SQL Server, .NET, '
                              'cloud services, Azure DevOps, PowerBI, SAP, '
                              'Docker, NoSQL, RPA, etc.)</li><li>Working '
                              'environment supporting your personal growth '

                              'to develop applications for major international '

                              'possibility to gain professional certificates '
                              'each year (personal development '
                              'budget)</li><li>Experience from an '
                              'international company - PwC Czech Republic is '
                              'full of various cultures and languages - at the '
                              'moment there are more than 200 individuals from '
                              '32 nationalities</li><li>Flexible start of your '
                              'working hours - start any time between 7 - 10 '
                              'a.m.</li><li>Compensated overtime - choose '
                              'extra pay or extra time off</li><li>Notebook '
                              'and iPhone with unlimited tariff and with data '
                              'package</li><li>Work in one of the most '
                              'ecologically friendly buildings. We are '
                              'situated just next to a large park where we '
                              'organize yoga classes or you can go running '
                              'during the lunch break</li><li>Possibility to '
                              'join our international sport tournaments - in '

{'apply_link': 'https://www.startupjobs.cz/nabidka/35029/data-analytik-part-time-internship?utm_source=juniorguru&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=juniorguru',

 'company_logo_path': 'images/logos-jobs/150fdf292dc976b971d1773f7710a2b78f368212.png',
 'company_name': 'Mutumutu',
 'description_html': '<p><strong>Kdo jsme?</strong></p><p><em>Mutumutu</em> '
                     'jsme založili, protože chceme zlepšovat svět pojištění. '
                     'Jsme zdravé životní pojištění a jsme hrdí na to, že '
                     'motivujeme lidi k zdravějšímu životnímu stylu. Když se o '
                     'sebe starají, vracíme jim část pojistného zpět. Je to '
                     'fér přístup: když se o sebe staráš, tak jsi zdravější a '
                     'pro pojišťovnu méně rizikový.\xa0</p><p>No a teď '
                     'rosteme, takže potřebujeme posilu. <strong>Do našeho '
                     'týmu hledáme datového nadšence, kterého baví reporting, '
                     'přemýšlí “out of box” a má rád, když je vše pod '
                     'kontrolou.</strong></p><p><strong>Co budeš '
                     'dělat?</strong></p><ul><li dir="ltr"><p>Zpracovávat a '
                     'tvořit pravidelné a ad hoc reporty.</p></li><li '
                     'dir="ltr"><p>Získávat data z databáze pomocí SQL '
                     'dotazů.</p></li><li dir="ltr"><p>Analyzovat a '
                     'interpretovat získaná data.</p></li><li '
                     'dir="ltr"><p>Hledat nové přístupy a řešení, která nám '
                     'pomůžou dělat relevantní závěry o našem businessu a '
                     'chování zákazníků.</p></li><li dir="ltr"><p>V případě '
                     'potřeby pomáhat s další agendou, při které budeš mít '
                     'možnost se dále technicky vzdělávat.</p></li><li '
                     'dir="ltr"><p>A pokud něco z výše zmiňovaného neumíš na '
                     '100 %? Nevadí, rádi Tě to doučíme. Od toho tady máme tým '
                     'šikovných kolegů, kteří ti '
                     'pomohou.</p></li></ul><p><strong>Koho '
                     'hledáme?</strong></p><ul><li dir="ltr"><p>Takového '
                     '<em>Sherlocka Holmese</em> - zkrátka někoho, koho baví '
                     'pátrat, hledat vzorce, hrát si s tabulkami, zkoumat data '
                     'a následně z nich vytvářet analýzy a závěry.</p></li><li '
                     'dir="ltr"><p>Parťáka s analytickým myšlením, který se '
                     'neztratí v naši business logice a dokáže uchopit hromadu '
                     'edge casů, na které je potřeba myslet.</p></li><li '
                     'dir="ltr"><p>Znalce SQL (v Mutumutu pracujeme s Metabase '
                     'a Exponea, předchozí zkušenost s BI tooly bude tedy '
                     'vítána, nicméně vždy jsme otevřeni novým nápadům a '
                     'technologiím).</p></li><li dir="ltr"><p>Odvážlivce, '
                     'který si poradí sám, ale zároveň se nebojí zeptat, když '
                     'je potřeba.</p></li><li dir="ltr"><p>Vzhledem k tomu, že '
                     'momentálně expandujeme na další trhy a náš tým je '
                     'mezinárodní, budeš potřebovat angličtinu na '
                     'komunikativní úrovni.</p></li></ul><p><strong>Co '
                     'nabízíme?</strong></p><ul><li dir="ltr"><p>Práci, co '
                     'dává smysl a pomáhá lidem (<a '
                     'href="https://www.mutumutu.cz/blog/2020/06/03/klietni-mutumutu-cevni-mozkova-prihoda-pomozte-rodine-s-detmi-a-maminkou-na-voziku/" '

                     '</strong><strong>DevOps specialistou</strong>, který '
                     'bude mít na starosti bezproblémový běh našich aplikací v '
                     'cloudu.</p><p>Jsme malá firma o 25 vývojářích, ne '

                     'od začátku a významně tak ovlivnit co a jak se bude '

                     'využívající '

                     'S3</li></ul><p>Chtěli bychom tě <strong>naučit tuto '
                     'infrastrukturu ovládat</strong> a dát ti možnost '
                     '<strong>dále ji rozjívet</strong>.</p><p>Naše cloudová '
                     'infrastruktura se podřizuje převážně požadavkům '
                     'backendových vývojářů, a proto bude alespoň částečná '
                     'znalost vývoje webových aplikací v Javě výhodou. Není to '
                     'však podmínkou.</p><p>Práce je možná<strong>\xa0i na '

 'description_html': '<div class="description__text description__text--rich">\n'
                     '      \n'
                     '    <section class="show-more-less-html" '
                     'data-max-lines="5">\n'
                     '      <div class="show-more-less-html__markup '
                     'show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">\n'
                     '        Náplň práce<br><br>Hledáme PHP programátora do '
                     'rostoucí českokrumlovské webové agentury. Přijmeme '
                     'juniorního i seniorního kolegu, který se chce učit a '
                     'posouvat dál. Vyvíjíme primárně v PHP, MySQL, Nette, '

                              'v úzkém partnerství se CEO a vždy dostaneš '

EXPLICITLY_JUNIOR E-commerce (PHP/Symfony) developer/ka - Junior
⇢ \bjunior\w*\b
 features_parser
EXPLICITLY_SENIOR Dostaneš k sobě mentora z řad našich seniorních vývojářů, který tě provede všemi zákoutími tvé budoucí práce.
⇢ \bsenior\w*\b
 features_parser
INDEPENDENCE_PREFERRED Jelikož má každý projekt individuální potřeby, tým daného projektu rozhoduje, jaké technologie je budou nejlépe řešit s přihlédnutím na dev-stack firmy.
⇢ \bsamostatn\w+|individuáln\w+\b
 features_parser
JUNIOR_FRIENDLY Dostaneš k sobě mentora z řad našich seniorních vývojářů, který tě provede všemi zákoutími tvé budoucí práce.
⇢ \bdostane\w+[\b\W](.+[\b\W])?senior\w+\b

                              'firmy.<p></p><p><strong>Jak bude vypadat tvoje '

                              'k sobě mentora z řad našich seniorních '

CZECH_REQUIRED
language_filter
INDEPENDENCE_PREFERRED Pracuješ samostatně a co neumíš, na to se zeptáš nebo se naučíš.
⇢ \bsamostatn\w+|individuáln\w+\b
 features_parser
JUNIOR_FRIENDLY Pracuješ samostatně a co neumíš, na to se zeptáš nebo se naučíš.
⇢ \b[nz]aučí(me|š)\b
⇢ \bnebo[\b\W](.+[\b\W])?\w+uč(it|íš|íte|íme)\b
 features_parser
LEARNING_REQUIRED Ochotu se nadále rozvíjet a učit se novým věcem a technologiím.
⇢ \b(chce\w*|chtěj\w*|chtít|chuť|ochot\w+|schopn\w+)[\b\W](.+[\b\W])?(učit|na sobě|rozvíj\w+)\b
⇢ \bučit se\b

                     'boku firem, jako jsou např. Bonami, Glami nebo Rohlík. '
                     '<strong>Naší misí je pomoct (nejen) gastro segmentu '
                     'zlepšit péči o hosty a digitalizovat provoz podniků. '
                     '</strong>Od snadného placení pomocí QR kódu, přes '
                     'objednávky přímo od stolu nebo taky ty s vyzvednutím u '
                     'okénka, až po cílenou komunikaci restaurací s hosty '
                     'prostřednictvím naší aplikace. Zkrátka, snažíme se '
                     'šetřit čas jak hostům, tak obsluze a návštěvu restaurace '
                     'o něco víc zpříjemnit.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Do týmu '
                     'nyní hledáme nového kolegy, kteří nám pomůžou rozvíjet '

          'description_text': 'Jsme Qerko - mladý startup sídlící v Praze na '
                              'Smíchově. Jsme hrdými členy Miton family, kde '
                              'stojíme po boku firem, jako jsou např. Bonami, '
                              'Glami nebo Rohlík. Naší misí je pomoct (nejen) '
                              'gastro segmentu zlepšit péči o hosty a '
                              'digitalizovat provoz podniků. Od snadného '
                              'placení pomocí QR kódu, přes objednávky přímo '
                              'od stolu nebo taky ty s vyzvednutím u okénka, '
                              'až po cílenou komunikaci restaurací s hosty '
                              'prostřednictvím naší aplikace. Zkrátka, snažíme '
                              'se šetřit čas jak hostům, tak obsluze a '
                              'návštěvu restaurace o něco víc zpříjemnit.\n'
                              'Do týmu nyní hledáme nového kolegy, kteří nám '
                              'pomůžou rozvíjet Qerko po technické stránce, '
                              'tedy odborníky na vývoj realtime webových '
                              'aplikací.\n'

                              'pokladní systémy, platební brány a hosté v '

                              'reálném čase.\n'
